songLyrics: Mela dilon ka aata hai ik baar aake chala jata haiAate hain musafir jaate hain musafirJana hi hai unko kyon aate hain musafirMela dilon ka...Hans le ga le yeh din na milenge kalThodi khushiyan hain thode se yeh palEk baar phir chali jaayein jo yeh bahaareinLaut kar na aayengi gujri bahaareinMela baharon ka aata hai ik baar aake chala jata haiAati hain bahaarein jaati hain bahaareinJana hi hai unko kyon aati hain bahaareinMela dilon ka...Saajan ek tujh pe bharosa haiIs bheed mein ek tu hi mera haiMausam badle badle zamanaVaada kiya jo vaada nibhana haiHathon ki lakeerein gaayein yeh taranaMar kar bhi yeh rishta hai humko nibhanaMela dilon ka...Aayi re jawani jaise rut toofaniPagli yeh deewani main kya karoonMela jawani ka aata hai ik baar aake chala jata haiAati hai jawani jaati hai jawaniJana hi hai usko kyon aati hai jawaniMela dilon ka...

songName: Chitthi Aai Hai Aai Hai Chitthi Aai Hai
songLyrics: Chitthi aayi hai aayi hai chitthi aayi hai -2Chitthi hai watan se chitthi aayi haiBade dinon ke baad, hum bevatanon ko yaad -2Watan ki mitti aayi hai, chitthi aayi hai...Oopar mera naam likha hain, andar yeh paigam likha hain -2O pardes ko jaane waale, laut ke phir na aane waaleSaat samundar paar gaya tu, humko zinda maar gaya tuKhoon ke rishte tod gaya tu, aankh mein aansoo chhod gaya tuKam khaate hain kam sote hain, bahut zyada hum rote hain, chitthi...Sooni ho gain shehar ki galiyan, kaante ban gain baag ki kaliyan -2Kehte hain savan ke jhoole, bhool gaya tu hum nahin bhooleTere bin jab aayi divaali, dip nahin dil jale hain khaaliTere bin jab aayi holi, pichakaari se chhooti goliPeepal soonaa panaghat soonaa ghar shamashaan ka bana namoonaa -2Fasal kati aayi baisaakhi, tera aana reh gaya baaki, chitthi...Pehle jab tu kat likhataa tha kaagaz mein chehra dikhta tha -2Band hua yeh mel bhi ab to, khatam hua yeh khel bhi ab toDoli mein jab baithi bahana, rasta dekh rahe the naina -2Main to baap hoon mera kya hai, teri maan ka haal bura haiTeri bivi karti hai seva, soorat se lagti hain bevaaToone paisaa bahut kamaayaa, is paise ne desh chhudaayaaPanchhi pinjaraa tod ke aaja, desh paraya chhod ke aajaAaja umar bahut hai chhoti, apne ghar mein bhi hain roti, chitthi...

songName: Tere Bin Main Kuchh Bhi Nahin
songLyrics: Tere bin main kuchh bhi nahin mere bin tu kuchh bhi nahinTere saare aansoo mere meri saari khushiyan teriTere bin main kuchh bhi...Tu aasman main zameen tu jahan main bhi wahinMeri duniya wahan tu hi tu tu nahin to main bhi nahinMain chaaron dhaam kyon jaaoon mere tirth hain bas yahinTere saare aansoo mere...Do shahazaade raat akeli reh na jaaye baat adhooriMere bhaai tu mujhse kuchh kehna chahata haiKeh de na yah adhoori baat mujhe samajh mein nahin aatiKoi to badi baat hai bhaaiApne chhote bhaai se kyon chhupaataa haiMain dil hoon dhadkan tu hai kaise bhooloon bachpan tu haiYah duniya hai zaalim badi bada bhola tu maasoom haiEk baajoo se hoga uthana mere bhaai tujhe yeh zameenTere saare aansoo mere...

songName: Agar Aasman Tak Mera Haath Jata
songLyrics: Agar aasman tak mera hath jataTo tere maathe pe chanda ki bindiya lagaataaTeri maang taaron se main sajataAgar aasman tak mera hath jataTo chandni se sehra banaatiMohabbat ki dhadkan se usko sajaatiMain khud apne hathon se tumko pahanaatiAgar aasman tak...Mere paas dil ke siwa kuchh nahin haiZamane mein dil se bada kuchh nahin haiTo phir aa tujhe apne dil mein basa loonTujhe apne hathon ki rekha bana loonAgar yeh samandar mere bas mein hotaMohabbat ka moti main ismein se laatiSun mere saajan sun mere sathiAgar aasman tak...Agar tujhse bichhadoon to mar jaaoon sanamKasam tujhko meri na bol aisa humdamKya hai tamanna teri mere saajanRahoon tere dil mein teri ban ke dhadkanAgar yeh jahan meri mutthi mein aataTo tujh par se qurban karke lutataAgar aasman tak...

songName: Aye Ji O Ji Lo Ji Suno Ji - Mera Naam Hai Lakhan
songLyrics: Aye jee o jee lo jee suno jee main hoon manmaujiKarta hoon main jo woh tum bhi karo jeeOne two ka four, four two ka one, my name is lakhanSajanon ka sajan mera naam hai lakhanAye jee o jee...Ho duniya chakori he paisaa hai chanda sooli pe latka har ek bandaaSabke gale mein maya ka phanda seekho o yaaron inse yeh dhandhaaHo do bol meethe bas bol ke har maal becho kam taul ke re baba kam taul keTum apni khaali jeben bharo jeeKarta hoon main jo...Main kuchh na jaanoon isase zyada tu mera mohan main teri radhaJeevan nahin itna sidhaa saada kaise karoon tumse koi vaadaWaade hain jhoothe sachche ho tum jaise bhi ho bade achchhe ho tumKehte ho sabse main hoon manmauji manmauji ho to mauj karo jeeOne two ka four...Karo koi jatan jaldi ho milanKha pee raha hai yeh sara zamana jo bhookhaa pyasa hai woh deewanaArre daulat ki jhoothi chamak pe na jana mehanat se roji roti kamaanaaKehna badon ka tum maan lo achchha bura kya hai jaan loArre kehta hoon main jo...Maine nahin suna phir se kaho jeeNahin number two koi donon hi number oneMere raam lakhan jiyo raam lakhanSajanon ke sajan jiyo raam lakhan

[Meaning of Gujarati lines:
A green lemon tree a green nagarvel (the one which is used for eating pan) plant. God (indicating a person as respect) please visit our house, have a stay at our house and God say's he won't be able to stay as Goddess Sita is waiting at their place. Goddess Sita is alone
and also waiting for God Ram and Lakhsman.]

Lyrics and meaning of these Gujarati Lines are provided by Anand Patel via Facebook comments. We are grateful to him.

songLyrics: Zamane ke dekhe hain rang hazaar nahin kuchh siwa pyaar keTu hai sanam meri pehli mohabbat tujh pe luta doon main duniya ki chahatZulfon ke saaye mein jeena hai mujhko dil ki panahon mein rakhoongaa tujhkoIs bekaraari mein aaye karaarNahin kuchh siwa...Aa ke tu lag ja gale mere yaarNahin kuchh siwa...Chahat ka rangin armaan ban ke tum dil mein rehna meri jaan ban keTeri muhabbar mein main hoon deewani teri amaanat yeh zindganiHar saans meri hai tujh pe nisaarNahin kuchh siwa...

songName: Hum Tere Bin Kahin Rah Nahin Paate
songLyrics: Hum tere bin kahin reh nahin paate tum nahin aate to hum mar jaateHaaye pyaar kya cheez hai yeh jaan nahin paateHum tere bin kahin...Ude khushboo kali mehke yeh rut badle bahaar aayeMohabbat karne ki jaanam umra ek baar aayeTumhein pyaar karne ko jee karta hai ikraar karne ko jee karta haiTum nahin hote to dil na lagaate dil ki tadap hum kisko bataateHaaye pyaar kya cheez hai...Tum nahin hote to hum mar jaateBhulaaye se na bhoolen mere dilbar teri baateinTeri yaadon mein guzarin kai subah kai raateinTujhse door jo kahin hum jaayenge har ghadi hum tujhe yaad aayengeTeri in baaton se hum ghabaraate tauba tum hamein kitna tadapaateHaaye pyaar kya cheez hai...Kabhi dekhoon jo main darpan chehra tera nazar aayeJab jab leti hoon main saansein teri khushboo bikhar jaayeTere bin ab jeena mushkil hai main dil hoon tera tu mera dil haiSari umra to hum pachhataate raaz koi jo tujhse chhupaateHaaye pyaar kya cheez hai...

songName: Aurat Ne Janam Diya Mardon Ko
songLyrics: Aurat ne janam diya mardon ko, mardon ne use bazaar diyaJab jee chaha kuchalaa masalaa, jab jee chaha dutkaar diyaTulati hai kahin dinaaron mein, bikati hai kahin baazaaron meinNangi nachavaai jaati hai, aiyyaashon ke darabaaron meinYeh woh beizzat cheez hai jo, bant jati hai izzatadaaron meinMardon ke liye har zulm ravaan, aurat ke liye rona bhi khataMardon ke liye lakhon sejen, aurat ke liye bas ek chitaMardon ke liye har aish ka haq, aurat ke liye jeena bhi sazaJin hothon ne inko pyaar kiya, un hothon ka vyaapaar kiyaJis kokh mein inka jism dhalaa, us kokh ka kaarobaar kiyaJis tan se uge kopal ban kar, us tan ko zalil-o-khar kiyaMardon ne banaayi jo rasmein, unko haq ka farmaan kahaAurat ke zinda jal jaane ko, kurbaani aur balidaan kahaKismat ke badle roti di, usko bhi ehsaan kahaSansar ki har ek besharmi, gurbat ki god mein palati haiChakalon mein hi aa ke rukati hai, faakon mein jo raah nikalati haiMardon ki havas hai jo aksar, aurat ke paap mein dhalati haiAurat sansar ki kismat hai, fir bhi taqdeer ki hoti haiAvataar payambar janati hai, phir bhi shaitan ki beti haiYeh woh badaqismat maan hai jo, beton ki sez pe leti hai

songLyrics: Jab haal-e-dil tumse kehne main milne aati hoonPar dekh tera deewanapan main soch mein pad jaati hoonJab haal-e-dil...Dil to deewana hai maine jana haiIsliye to tumhein dilbar jana haiYoon dil ko kisi tarasaanaa achchhi baat nahinSachche premi ko tadpana achchhi baat nahinMain na dekhoon jab talak tumko na chain paati hoonPar dekh tera deewanapan...Yeh ishq nahin aasan bas itna samajh lijeIk aag ka dariya hai aur doob ke jana haiIshq waale kisi aag se na dareinPyaar ki raah mein bhi mar ke bhi woh chaleinChaahe kuchh bhi ab ho jaaye tere pyaar meinHai pyaar bina rakha bhi kya is sansar meinTu yaad aaye jis bhi ghadi mujhko main daudi aati hoonPar dekh tera deewanapan...Aahein bharane laga yeh dil-e-bekaraarTumse hi zindagi mein aye sanam thi bahaarTu chain mera tu pyaar mera o jaan-e-jigarMere pyaar tu aye jaan-e-wafa kyon hai bekhabarMain raat aur din geet bas tere hi gunagunaati hoonPar dekh tera deewanapan...

songName: O Rabba Koi To Bataaye Pyaar Hota Hai Kya
songLyrics: O rabba hoO rabba koi to bataayeO rabba koi to bataaye pyaar hota hai kyaJaisa mujhe ho gaya sabko hota hai kyaO rabba koi to bataaye...Yeh kaun aaya lage man bhaayaaZindagi ke paas mujhe kaun le aayaO rabba koi to bataaye chain hota hai kyaJaisa mera kho gaya sabakaa khota hai kyaO rabba koi to bataaye...Khyaalon ke baagon mein main jab khadi thiTabhi ek gul ne awaaz di thiKali si mehakne lagi tu kyon goriChhalakane lagi kyon yeh gaagar toriPhool poochhataa raha main sochti rahiO rabba koi to bataaye roop hota hai kyaJaisa mera khil gaya sabakaa khilta hai kyaO rabba koi to bataaye...Hum to oonche gagan mein udane lageEk dooje se judane lageO rabba koi to bataaye mit hota hai kyaJaisa mujhe mil gaya sabko milta hai kyaO rabba koi to bataaye...
